languages.text: "Урбенд, вашему сыну хватило смелости признаться в своей ошибке. Я попробую найти в своем сердце немного сострадания к нему".
"Urbend, your son has found the courage to admit his mistake. I will try and find some compassion for him in my heart."
languages.original_text: "Урбенд, вашему сыну хватило смелости признаться в своей ошибке. Я попробую найти в своем сердце немного сострадания к нему".

traits.locale_text: "Urbend, your son has found the courage to admit his mistake. I will try and find some compassion for him in my heart."
"Urbend, your son has found the courage to admit his mistake. I will try and find some compassion for him in my heart."
"Urbend, your son has mustered the courage to admit his mistake. I will try and muster some compassion for him in my heart."
"Urbend, your son has mustered the courage to admit his mistake. I will try and muster some compassion for him in my heart."
"Urbend, your son has found the courage to admit his mistake. I will try and find some compassion for him in my heart."
"Urbend, your son has found the courage to admit his mistake. I will try and find some compassion for him in my heart."

languages.text: 「アーベント、お前の息子は自分の過ちを認める勇気を見つけた。だから私は努めて彼に慈悲をかけよう」
languages.original_text: "Urbend, your son has found the courage to admit his mistake. I will try and find some compassion for him in my heart."

traits.locale_text: 「アーベント、お前の息子は自分の過ちを認める勇気を見つけた。だから私は努めて彼に慈悲をかけよう」

languages.text: “厄本，你的儿子至少鼓起勇气承认了自己的错误，我会尽量同情他的。”
languages.original_text: "Urbend, your son has found the courage to admit his mistake. I will try and find some compassion for him in my heart."

traits.locale_text: “厄本，你的儿子至少鼓起勇气承认了自己的错误。我会尽量同情他的。”

languages.text: « Urbend, considérant que votre fils a eu le courage d'admettre son erreur, je vais essayer de faire preuve d'un minimum de compassion. »
languages.original_text: "Urbend, your son has found the courage to admit his mistake. I will try and find some compassion for him in my heart."

traits.locale_text: « Urbend, considérant que votre fils a eu le courage d'admettre son erreur, je vais essayer de faire preuve d'un minimum de compassion. »

languages.text: «Urbend, su hijo ha encontrado el valor para admitir su error. Intentaré encontrar piedad en mi corazón para él».
languages.original_text: "Urbend, your son has found the courage to admit his mistake. I will try and find some compassion for him in my heart."

traits.locale_text: «Urbend, su hijo ha reunido el valor para admitir su error. Intentaré que mi corazón se apiade de él».

languages.text: "Urbend, Euer Sohn hat den Mut aufgebracht, seinen Fehler zu gestehen. Ich werde versuchen, in meinem Herzen ein wenig Mitgefühl für ihn aufzubringen."
languages.original_text: "Urbend, your son has found the courage to admit his mistake. I will try and find some compassion for him in my heart."

traits.locale_text: "Urbend, Euer Sohn hat den Mut aufgebracht, seinen Fehler zu gestehen. Ich werde versuchen, in meinem Herzen ein wenig Mitgefühl für ihn aufzubringen."

languages.text: "Urbend, oğlun hatasını kabullenecek cesareti kendinde bulabildi. Ben de onun için yüreğimde merhamet bulmaya çalışacağım."
languages.original_text: "Urbend, your son has found the courage to admit his mistake. I will try and find some compassion for him in my heart."

traits.locale_text: "Urbend, oğlun hatasını kabullenecek cesareti kendinde bulabildi. Ben de onun için yüreğimde merhamet bulmaya çalışacağım."
